Appendix

Here‚Äôs a clean, engaging outline and sample text for a one-page MBA student portfolio, tailored to reflect your background and goals. This is ideal for showcasing yourself on a personal website or professional portfolio PDF.

‚úÖ Outline for One-Page MBA Portfolio

  1. Header

    • Full Name
    • MBA Program & Graduation Year
    • LinkedIn | Email | GitHub (if applicable) | Location

  2. Professional Summary

    • 3‚Äì5 sentences summarizing your academic and career background, skills, and future goals

  3. Core Competencies

    • Bullet list or grouped keywords (e.g., Data Analysis, Strategic Thinking, Leadership, SQL, Python, etc.)

  4. Experience Highlights

    • Current role with impact-based points
    • One previous key role or project (if relevant)

  5. Education

    • MBA (Current)
    • Any previous degrees (esp. if different field, like STEM or education)

  6. Projects

    • 1‚Äì2 brief mentions of standout projects, preferably with results or tools used

  7. Career Goals / Interests

    • 1 short paragraph on your direction: data analyst, teaching, business strategy, etc.

üìù Sample One-Page MBA Portfolio Text

Kirti Sharma MBA Candidate, 2025 | Vancouver, BC LinkedIn.com/in/kirti-sharma | kirti@email.com | GitHub.com/kirti-code (optional)

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Driven MBA student with a unique academic foundation in bioinformatics and zoology, combined with experience in educational leadership and programming. Currently serving as Assistant Director at Mathnasium West Vancouver, where I manage operations, mentor staff, and lead student learning outcomes. Adept at blending analytical thinking with real-world problem solving. Passionate about transitioning into data analytics to merge technical expertise with strategic business insights.

CORE COMPETENCIES

Data Analysis ‚Ä¢ Business Strategy ‚Ä¢ Python ‚Ä¢ SQL (Basic) ‚Ä¢ Leadership ‚Ä¢ Communication ‚Ä¢ Tableau ‚Ä¢ Excel ‚Ä¢ Team Development ‚Ä¢ Problem Solving

EXPERIENCE

Assistant Centre Director, Mathnasium | Vancouver, BC 2023 ‚Äì Present

  • Lead operational planning, staff scheduling, and performance tracking across student programs
  • Designed and improved workflows for onboarding and progress reporting, increasing efficiency by 20%
  • Coach a team of instructors while building strong relationships with parents and students

Online Programming & Math Instructor 2019 ‚Äì 2022

  • Delivered custom lessons in Python and math for international students across different grade levels
  • Developed and revised curriculum content aligned with learner needs and progress metrics

EDUCATION

Master of Business Administration (MBA) University Name, Canada ‚Äì Expected 2025

M.Sc. Zoology & B.Sc. Bioinformatics University Name, India

PROJECTS

  • Customer Segmentation using K-Means Clustering ‚Äì Cleaned and analyzed sales data to build actionable customer groups; tools used: Python, pandas, matplotlib
  • AI Proposal for Educational Centers ‚Äì Wrote a strategy paper on implementing AI at Mathnasium, integrating change management models like Kotter‚Äôs 8-Step

CAREER INTERESTS

I‚Äôm exploring roles at the intersection of education, data, and strategy‚Äîwhether that means becoming a data analyst, a tech-savvy educator, or building my own ed-tech business. I‚Äôm especially drawn to projects that involve storytelling through data and driving smarter decisions in learning-focused organizations.

Let me know if you‚Äôd like a custom HTML, Quarto, or Canva version of this design!

Commentary on Changes

The output from ChatGPT provided with an overview of how a portfolio looks like and what goes into it. I revised the layout of the proposed sample, and also added the relevant information. Besides, I also worked on frontend of the webpage and made it look more professional and engaging.
